text: There was a similar problem for XSSF reported in bug 57165, maybe a similar fix will be neceswsary here.

creator: dominik.stadler@gmx.at
text: With r1734862 we now try harder to find a unique name for new slides to avoid name-clashes when some parts of the previous slide still linger on for some reason.
*** Bug 60042 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
